element.short: active | on-hold | cancelled | completed | entered-in-error | stopped | draft | unknown
element.definition: A code specifying the current state of the order.  Generally this will be active or completed state.
element.comment: This element is labeled as a modifier because the status contains codes that mark the resource as not currently valid.

binding.description: A coded concept specifying the state of the prescribing event. Describes the lifecycle of the prescription
